product_name: Genuine Innovations UltraFlate Plus CO2 Tire Inflator
long_description: Get rolling again quickly after a flat with the fast and trigger-controlled Genuine Innovations UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator. Trigger-controlled inflation lets you start, and stop, inflating a tire with a trigger pull or release; built-in trigger lock prevents accidental discharge. Works with both Presta and Schrader valves. Sturdy construction ensures lasting use and helps protect hands from being frozen by the discharging cartridge. Works with all Genuine Innovations 12 and 16g non-threaded CO2 cartridges, 12, 16 and 25g threaded CO2 cartridges (sold separately). The Genuine Innovations UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator comes with a single 16g non-threaded CO2 cartridge.
short_description: Get rolling again quickly after a flat with the fast and trigger-controlled Genuine Innovations UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator.
